# Badge

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The badge component is a small label, generally appearing inside or in proximity to another larger interface component,
representing a status, property, or some other metadata.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                      | Type                     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Allows you to change the color of the badge to make it less bright (based on the color chosen by the CSS class). | `"initial" \| "lighter"` | `'initial'` |
| `shape`  | `shape`   | Define the shape of the badge                                                                                    | `"normal" \| "rounded"`  | `'normal'`  |
| `size`   | `size`    | Specify the size of the badge.                                                                                   | `"l" \| "m" \| "s"`      | `'m'`       |
